description: MinIO configuration for BHYT XML processing pipeline
notes: Endpoint: MinIO server address (without http:// prefix)
AccessKey: MinIO access key (like AWS access key)
SecretKey: MinIO secret key (like AWS secret key)
XmlFolderPath: Folder path within bucket for XML files
UseSSL: Set to true for HTTPS, false for HTTP
CreateBucketIfNotExists: Auto-create bucket if it doesn't exist
